modmenu.summaryTranslation.pickblockpro: Teleport utility mod, making it much easier to get around.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.pickblock: Teleport utility mod, making it much easier to get around.
text.autoconfig.tputils.title: TP Utils Config
text.autoconfig.tputils.option.singlepla:
TP command for when playing in singleplayer
For example /tp or /tppos
text.autoconfig.tputils.option.serverTpM:
TP command for when playing on a server
For example /tp or /tppos
text.autoconfig.tputils.option.tpThrough:
From how far should the mod be able 
to detect blocks to TP through
text.autoconfig.tputils.option.tpOnTopRa:
From how far should the mod be able 
to detect blocks to TP onto
text.autoconfig.tputils.option.tpForward: The amount of blocks you'll TP forward
text.autoconfig.tputils.option.allowCraw:
Allow the mod to teleport you 
into a 1 block high space
text.autoconfig.tputils.option.allowLava: Allow the mod to teleport you into lava
text.autoconfig.tputils.option.setBedroc:
Stop the mod from teleporting you below 
bedrock / the bottom world limit
text.autoconfig.tputils.option.enabledOn: Teleportations will only work in Creative Mode
text.tputils.message.tooMuchWall: Too much wall. You shall not pass!
text.tputils.message.noBlockFound: No block in sight (or too far)!
text.tputils.message.cantMoveForward: Unable to move any further forward!
text.tputils.message.noOpenSpaceBelow: There is no open space below the ground / current floor!
text.tputils.message.noPreviousLocation: Unable to find a previous location
